page.title: 09Torridon camp site
page.content: The{camp site}which is near the Youth Hostel in Torridon,is open all year round.It is staffed from April to the end of September.30to 40 tents are the most that have camped so far, though it can hold more.{Charges are 50p per {tent per night;}it does not matter how many peole nor how big the tent is.The site is run by{The District Council}It is used mostly by young people,hikers and climbers.Many are foreigners Dutch mostly.Sometimes the same group return every year,staying longer every time, sometimes up to two weeks. There are very few cyclists,due to distance,and having to carry equipment;most come by car or van,parking in the adjacent car park.There is a toilet block with hot water and showers.Obviously,good dry weather brings more campers, but even in winter enthusiasts camp in the area in tents, vans and caravans.
